ARABIC: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَهُمْ فِى رَوْضَةٍ يُحْبَرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: As for those who had iman and did right actions, they will be made joyful in a verdant meadow.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Those who believed and did the right will be feasted in a rich, well-watered meadow.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then those who believed and acted righteously will be placed in a Garden and will be happy and jubilant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The righteously striving believers will happily live in paradise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So those who believed and did good deeds – they will be hosted in the Garden.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then as for those who believed and did righteous good deeds, such shall be honored and made to enjoy a luxurious life in a Garden of Delight.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then as to those who believed and did good, they shall be made happy in a garden.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: as for those who believed, and did deeds of righteousness, they shall walk with joy in a green meadow,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: As for those who believed and did good works, they will be made happy in a Garden.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: those who believed and did good deeds will rejoice in a Garden,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then as for those who believed and worked righteous works, they shall be in a meadow made happy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: As for those who have faith and do righteous deeds, they shall be in a garden, rejoicing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then those who have believed and worked righteous deeds, shall be made happy in a Mead of Delight.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then as for those who believed (in the Oneness of Allah Islamic Monotheism) and did righteous good deeds, such shall be honoured and made to enjoy luxurious life (forever) in a Garden of delight (Paradise).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: those who believe and did good deeds shall be well pleased in a garden,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: As for those who believed and did good deeds—they will be delighted in meadows.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And as for those who had believed and done righteous deeds, they will be in a garden [of Paradise], delighted.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [30:15] As for those who believed and performed righteous deeds, they shall be made happy in a garden [of Paradise].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (As for those who believed) in Muhammad (pbuh) and in the Qur'an (and did good works) acts of obedience between themselves and their Lord, (they will be made happy in a Garden) they will be in Paradise, honoured and showered with gifts.
